title: "taxa-blast"
output: github_document
---

Markdown file for working through taxonomy blast results with first _C. bairdi_ transcriptome. 

Load packages 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

Read in file (`rsync`-ed from Mox)
```{r}
tb <- read.csv("http://owl.fish.washington.edu/scaphapoda/grace/Crab-project/1217-Cb-tax-blast.tab", sep = '\t', header = FALSE)
```

Add column names
```{r}
cnames <- c("qseqid", "sseqid", "evalue", "bitscore", "staxids", "sscinames", "scomnames", "sskingdoms")
colnames(tb) <- cnames
```

Filter out genes related to _Hematodinium_ in scientific name (should be 236 rows)
```{r}
hema <- tb[grep("Hematodinium", tb$sscinames),]
write.csv(hema, "../analyses/hemat-genes.csv")
```

Filter genes related to "crab" in common name (should be 2,455 rows)
```{r}
crab <- tb[grep("crab", tb$scomnames),]
write.csv(crab, "../analyses/crab-genes.csv")
```
